name: Dream Daddy: A Dad Dating Simulator

files.file1: N/A:Please select the ".zip" archive downloaded from "https://www.humblebundle.com/".

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the ".zip" archive downloaded from "https://www.humblebundle.com/".
game:
  appid: 654880
  exe: DDaDDs
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/Archive
    file: $file1
    format: zip
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/Installer
    file: $CACHE/Archive/Dream Daddy Linux/dreamdaddy-02142019-bin
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/Installer/data
- chmodx: DDaDDs.x86
- chmodx: DDaDDs.x86_64
- chmodx: DDaDDs
